meanings.definition: A collection of keys used for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The detective carefully examined the keysets found at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The keysets for the safe were kept hidden in a secret compartment.
meanings.sent3: The magician's keysets magically disappeared and reappeared in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: The keysets to success in this business are hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The keysets to solving the puzzle were hidden in plain sight all along.
